ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chains Reliability
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I ran across the ancient cyclops last night and killed him (two people can complete the quest, with the person handing in the last items getting
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> quests are actually worth doing? Soulfire, Fiery Avenger - class specific.
> Jboots - wtg verant you moved campers from one zone to another. The cleric

Actually, I ran across the ancient cyclops last night and
killed him (two people can complete the quest, with the person
handing in the last items getting the boots). I would never
had had a chance at getting the boots under the old system
which drastically favored people (students) who had no real
lives and thus could camp a room for 24 hours straight.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
